analysis.description:
DTF.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#162-179) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-knc.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#172-173)
	-omg.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#173-177)

Reentrancy in DTF.fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#222-243):
	External calls:
	- (kncExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,knc,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#224)
	- (omgExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,omg,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#225-226)
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#228-232)
	- omgCount = kyber.trade.value(omgCost)(ieth,omgCost,omg,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#232-235)
	External calls sending eth:
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#228-232)
	- omgCount = kyber.trade.value(omgCost)(ieth,omgCost,omg,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#232-235)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- balances (/unique_chucks/26/0xc9b3b3c9f3ff68d5c75a651136c6ee2897c936aa.sol#240-241)
